titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Paul Leroy Robeson.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/16/2003--Introduced. Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the Postal Service to issue, a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Paul Leroy Robeson (actor, singer, and civil rights advocate).
